meanings.definition: Shortening a word or phrase by omitting letters or sounds.
meanings.sent1: Abbreviating helps make long words shorter.
meanings.sent2: I used abbreviating to make 'information technology' into 'IT'.
meanings.sent3: The class had fun abbreviating their names for a game.
meanings.sent4: Abbreviating is like creating a secret code with words.
meanings.sent5: The art of abbreviating can be quite useful in saving time.

meanings.definition: To make something shorter by using fewer words.
meanings.sent1: She was abbreviating her speech to finish quickly.
meanings.sent2: Abbreviating the report made it more concise and clear.
meanings.sent3: He kept abbreviating his story until it became a riddle.
meanings.sent4: Abbreviating conversations can sometimes lead to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: Abbreviating is a skill that requires practice to master.

meanings.definition: To reduce in length or duration.
meanings.sent1: The editor was abbreviating the article to fit the page.
meanings.sent2: Abbreviating the meeting allowed everyone to leave early.
meanings.sent3: She tried abbreviating her commute by taking a shortcut.
meanings.sent4: Abbreviating the movie made it more fast-paced and exciting.
meanings.sent5: Abbreviating time spent on tasks can increase productivity.
